titleStmt.title: An Act for an assessment at the rate of five and thirty thousand pounds by the moneth upon England, six thousand pounds by the moneth upon Scotland, and nine thousand pounds by the moneth upon Ireland, for three years; from the twenty fourth of June 1657. For a temporary supply towards the maintenance of the armies and navies of this Commonvvealth· At the Parliament begun at Westminster the 17th day of September, An. Dom. 1656.
Laws, etc. (Public general acts)
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and Iohn Field, printers to His Highness.,

notesStmt.note: In this edition, line 18 of title ends "Westminster".
On A2r: last word in first line of text: 'by'; first word under initial: 'nance'; last word in last full line of text: 'several'.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
